name: poker 3d
description:
Game in 3d. The player clicks "draw", and there is a distribution of cards. For distribution one point is subtracted. How many remained points it is possible to recognize by the table from below at center with the name "credits". Further the player can select what cards to leave, for this purpose it is necessary to click a card. Cards which will be left in following distributions are highlit by a table of "hold". After cards are selected, it is necessary to press the draw button. If there is a poker combination, then on top on a panel the text with a text of an advantageous combination leaves and points are added. The scoring can be doubled having pressed the double button. It is necessary to select a card which on value is more than the first card from the game "double".
Open achievements and take the place in the table of leaders.
